Thanks.  I have just submitted the following to the Eclipse 3.0 readme.  See 
if it helps you:

If you see a help launched with a blank page, and no errors displayed, it can 
be caused by a conflict between libraries in org.eclipse.tomcat plug-in and 
jars optionally installed in JRE jre/lib/ext directory.  To fix the problem, 
ensure that JRE used for running Eclipse does not contain J2EE or Apache jars 
in the jre/lib/ext directory.

Closing, assuming cleaning jre/lib/ext eliminated the problem, as there are no 
additional comments.
